mentions.context: We used scikitlearn for all our models and data processing [30].
As we used the ElasticNet Regulariser (L1+L2 regularisation of the coefficients), we also observed the selection of variables based on the Coefficient Importance analysis.
The data were annotated with Seshat [23] and Praat [24] softwares.

The data were annotated with Seshat [23] and Praat [24] softwares.
To automatically extract these features, we used the Praat software [24], the Parselmouth wrapper [25] and the tremor package [26].
To do so, we trained a logistic regression regularised with ElasticNet (e.g.
The fundamental frequency (F0) and MFCCs were obtained with the Kaldi toolkit [27].
